程序包 org.cloudbus.cloudsim.util

类 MathUtil

java.lang.Object
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.util.MathUtil
public class MathUtil
extends java.lang.Object
A class containing multiple convenient math functions.
从以下版本开始:
CloudSim Toolkit 3.0
